name: Behind Zombie Lines
storyline:
The apocalypse is here and you are stuck behind zombie lines. Here, the time is limited and you cannot afford to stop. To stay alive, you must shoot your way through the hungry hordes of the undead. Do remember, your gun is your only friend here because, between the zombies and you, only one can survive. 
 
Get involve yourself in a thrilling Zombie Survival Game. 
Keep your defense and shoot zombies in FPS view.
